selected_quotes: “The more federal politicians get involved in education, the worse we perform” – Misty Adoniou
More education has nothing to do with what happens in classrooms rhetoric. Big day for it.
@DalePearce3 Did you see this? Canada's great #pisa performance (despite no fed gov in ed) anoth…
We should stop blaming politicians and start generating positive solutions with resources like this
Good piece Australia's #PISA performance by Dr Misty Adoniou. Money matters the fed gov's policies haven't helped

citation.abstract: Politicians need to stop meddling with education policy and invest in teachers if Australia's science, mathematics and reading standards are to improve.
citation.title: Australia's students are failing. I blame the politicians
